entry.def: A balcony is a platform on the outside of a building, above ground level, with a wall or railing around it.
The balcony in a theatre or cinema is an area of seats above the main seating area.

means.word_mean: 1. an upper floor projecting from the rear over the main floor in an auditorium
2. a platform projecting from the wall of a building and surrounded by a balustrade or railing or parapet
